title: How to write an application for a school certificate - Quora

response.answer_text: Writing an application for a school certificate xx-xx-xxxx (Date) To, The Headmaster/Principal xxxxxxxxxx (school name) Subject: Application for school certificates. Sir/Ma'am, I am xxxxx(your name), admission number xxxxx and I was a student of class xxxxxx(class and division) in your school. Since I successfully completed my schooling with distinction from this prestigious school. Now, I would like to have my school certificates for further studying. Therefore, I request you to kindly issue me all the certificates. Yours obediently Xxxxxxx (your name) Class: Admission No:  Sample application for your reference 27 November 2019 To, The Headmaster/Principal Ideal International School, Indore. Subject: Application for school certificates. Sir/Ma'am, I am Emily, admission number 234 and I was a student of class X A in your school. Since I successfully completed my schooling with distinction from this prestigious school. I would like to, now, have my school certificates for further studying. Therefore, I request you to kindly issue me all the school certificates. Yours obediently Emily Class - X A Admission No:  I hope this answer is helpful to you. Thank you.

The Headmistress, Oxford Grammar School Respected Madam, With all due respect I am writing to inform that my father has got promotion to company head office and now he is moving to US and we are also going with him. So I have to leave the school as I will be shifting there and will continue my studies there. I request you to issue my school leaving certificate so I can initiate my admission process there. I shall be really thankful to you. Yours Obediently, Mark Alex7th grade
